Blue Cross of Louisiana doesn't give a shit about breast cancer (permalink) A jury has ordered Blue Cross of Louisiana to pay $421m to a hospital specializing in a much sought-after type of breast reconstruction, primarily for cancer survivors. The insurer "preapproved" surgeries for thousands of patients, but then held back 92% of the payments it owed, with CEO Steven Udvarhelyi insisting that "authorization never says we’re going to pay you": https://www.documentcloud.org/documents/25882446-steven-udvarhelyi-deposition/#document/p1/a2630959
